Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
instacart_bar =
  instacart |>
  filter(department == "snacks") |>
  group_by(aisle_id, aisle) |>
  summarise(orders = n(), .groups = "drop") |>
  arrange(desc(orders)) |>
  mutate(aisle = forcats::fct_reorder(aisle, orders)) 
```

### Bar Plot

```{r}
plot_ly(
  instacart_bar,
  x = ~aisle,
  y = ~orders,
  color = ~aisle,
  type = "bar",
  colors = "viridis"
) |> 
  layout(
    xaxis = list(title = "Number of Orders"),
    yaxis = list(title = "Aisle Name", tickfont = list(size = 8))
  )
```
